medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment by means of which the sender must uniquely identify the FINSTA message using its type and number and its function.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, if required, the time the message is created.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying a previously-sent message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference of the previously-sent message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the creation date/time of the referenced message.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the financial institutions involved in the financial statement of an account message, their functions and and their contacts.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution(s) associated with the transaction, in coded or uncoded form and their function.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading FII segment to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying the name(s) and address(es) of non-financial parties involved in the transaction, their function and their contacts.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the names and addresses of the parties associated with the FINSTA, in coded or uncoded form, and their function.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading NAD segment to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying details related to the account and type of account, such as statement number, balance, relevant amounts and dates.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the beginning of the specification of information related to the account by a sequential line number.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment specifying the account and type of account.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying, if necessary, the statement number and paging details.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment in free form to provide additional information which cannot be accommodated within other segments.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments indicating the balance of the account, its type and the respective dates (e.g. opening balance, final closing balance, etc.).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment indicating the balance of the account and its type.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date associated with the amount specified in the leading MOA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments providing references, value and entry dates, the business function of the booked items, amounts, type and status.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the beginning of the specification of the individual entries booked.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references of parties involved in the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the value and or entry date and/or time.

medi:segment.name: Business function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BUS, A segment identifying certain characteristics of the items stored in level C, such as business function.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount,its type and status of the booked item.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment in free form to provide additional information which cannot be accommodated within other segments.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment identifying the kind of control checks and the totals according to the coded form.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the FINSTA message.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the FINSTA message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the validation date/time.
